headline: Voters in for a surprise when they see full menu of primary ballot [Opinion]
author: Steven Henshaw
sentences: The impression left by TV political ads is that there are only two people running for the Republican nomination for the seat to be vacated by retiring Sen. Pat Toomey, a Republican.
The May 17 primary is only three weeks away, and I believe most voters are in for a surprise when they the curtain is closed behind them in a booth of their polling place.
